name: htmx-dynamic-url
description: HTMX extension to allow dynamic URL path templating based on JavaScript variables or store values.

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && terser src/dynamic-url.js --compress --mangle --output dist/dynamic-url.min.js --source-map "filename='dist/dynamic-url.min.js.map',url='dynamic-url.min.js.map'"
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test:src && npm run test:min
scripts.test:src: npm run test:v1:src && npm run test:v2:src
scripts.test:min: npm run test:v1:min && npm run test:v2:min
scripts.test:v1:src: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v1 EXT_FILE=src karma start karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:v1:min: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v1 EXT_FILE=min karma start karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:v2:src: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v2 EXT_FILE=src karma start karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:v2:min: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v2 EXT_FILE=min karma start karma.conf.cjs --single-run
scripts.test:watch:v1:src: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v1 EXT_FILE=src karma start karma.conf.cjs
scripts.test:watch:v1:min: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v1 EXT_FILE=min karma start karma.conf.cjs
scripts.test:watch:v2:src: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v2 EXT_FILE=src karma start karma.conf.cjs
scripts.test:watch:v2:min: cross-env HTMX_VERSION=v2 EXT_FILE=min karma start karma.conf.cjs
